crtkTask.introText: Businesses in certain ${certainIndustriesLink} must report chemicals they have on-site to the Community Right to Know (CRTK) program. These chemicals are known as `Environmental Hazardous Substances (EHS)|environmental-hazardous-substances`. Reporting EHS helps keep New Jersey communities and businesses safe.
crtkTask.helperText: Enter your information exactly as it appears in your business tax registration documents.
crtkTask.errorTextNotFound: We couldn't find a business matching the information you provided. Please check your entries and try again, or contact the NJDEP for assistance.
crtkTask.errorTextFieldsRequired: Please fill out all required fields.
crtkTask.errorTextSearchFailed: We're having trouble searching for your business right now. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
crtkTask.warningTitle: What if I don't complete this task?
crtkTask.warningText: Businesses that do not meet their CRTK requirements may receive thousands in fines and penalties.
crtkTask.regulatedBusinessWarningText: Regulated businesses that do not meet their CRTK requirements may receive thousands in fines and penalties.
crtkTask.federalInfoTitle: Important: Federal Requirements May Also Apply
crtkTask.federalInfoText: You may also be subject to federal Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act (EPCRA) reporting.
crtkTask.errorTextForm: Review the following fields for errors and missing information:
crtkTask.sendConfirmationText: Please review your information. Once submitted, your details will be sent to the CRTK team for review. You can only submit once.

crtkTask.businessActivitiesHelper: Tell us what your business does.
crtkTask.businessActivitiesExample: Example: “We fix cars, replace brakes, and do oil changes.”
crtkTask.materialsLabel: What materials or products do you store or use on site?

crtkTask.bizNotInDatabaseText: Your business is not in the CRTK database yet.`Why might this happen?|why-my-biz-not-in-crtk`
crtkTask.whatToDoNextText: If you've registered your business, fill out the form below and we’ll send your information to CRTK. This might give you an early exemption and help you avoid unnecessary paperwork. CRTK will check your business in 6–8 months and tell you if you need to report any chemicals.

crtkTask.ehsSurveyText: You must complete the survey if your facility had EHS above a specific threshold during the previous year. Fill out the survey for each location where the chemical was stored by March 1 every year.
